net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource

Class ResourceServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.ResourceServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Servlet, ServletConfig

    @Configurable
public class ResourceServlet
extends GenericServlet
    Servlet implementation to serve resources that implement that Resource interface.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • K_PATH

        public static final String K_PATH

        The path to this servlet. Must match the servlet mapping in the web application configuration.

        The parameter name is "path".
